description: people seated under trees on sidewalk at left; couple walking (man wearing top hat) in URQ; people on horseback and carriages on street at center in middle ground; building at right; more trees in center background
medium: Wood engraving on thin Japanese-style paper
portfolio: From Le Long de la Seine et des Boulevards
provenance: [Judith L. Pillsbury, Paris, until 1991; sold in December for LTO, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1991-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LRC, in the print: [A LEPERE]; LRC, in black: [A Lepère]
title: Avenue of the Champs-Elysées
